group_1.textLeft: Alright, I think we should start off with some@combat training…
Miyuri, um…are you going to be okay?

group_1.textRight: *pant*… *huff*… I’m just really nervous…

group_1.textLeft: There are no Witches here. There’s no need to be@so frightened…

group_1.textRight: *whimper*… I’m sorry…

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… This might be a bit of a problem.
…Well, even if you do lose control, I’m the only@one around.
Now then, come and get me!

group_1.textRight: O-okay…!
*gasp*!

group_1.textLeft: Whew… You finally came back to your senses…

group_1.textRight: Uh, um, w-what did I…?

group_1.textLeft: You were disoriented and going berserk… I only@barely managed to keep you in check.

group_1.textRight: S-sorry for the trouble...@[chara:103200:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103200:cheek_0][chara:103200:motion_400][chara:103200:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:103200:lipSynch_1]Wait, your legs…!
Did I- did I do that to you, Mifuyu…?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I’ll be fine. Don’t worry about it.

group_1.textRight: A-aah… What have- what have I done…?!

group_1.textLeft: P-please calm down, Miyuri!
You’re going to faint again…!

group_1.textRight: But- but- hurting such beautiful legs is just…

group_1.textLeft: My…legs?

group_1.textRight: O-oh… Your Magical Girl outfit shows too much@leg.
It’s like, my- my consciousness…could almost fade away!

group_1.textLeft: …I see.
So you have a…leg fetish, then…and looking at@legs makes you anxious?

group_1.textRight: Shorry…

group_1.textLeft: It’s alright; everyone has different tastes…
However, it’s another matter if it interferes with battle…
What an interesting story I happened to hear!@Heheh.

group_1.textRight: Looks like we’ve added another oddball to the@bunch.

group_1.textLeft: Good to see you both here.
(Could these- could these two be the girls@Lady San told me about…?)
(The bosses of the Magius…?!)

group_1.textRight: Hrm…

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what do you want? What do you want…?

group_1.textRight: Your cheeks are flushed, and your breathing is@labored.
I hypawthesize that the sight of legs triggers a@rush of dopamine for you.
I can’t believe you get so worked up that you@black out.
I guess you’re a different kind of furreak than@Alina!
…People in glass houses shouldn’t throw stones,@Touka.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100700:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Grr! Are you trying to pick a fight with me?!
Knock it off, both of you! Please don’t get into a@fight here!
I’d like to ask you girls to try to help Miyuri fight@more safely.
Do you have any suggestions?

group_1.textRight: San Kagura is the one who brought Miyuri Yukari@here, right?
In that case, we should leave it up to her.
They call her “Demon Instructor” for a reason.
I’m confident she’ll be purrfectly capable of@handling Miyuri Yukari, aren’t you?
We cannot afford to have you spending all of your@time with this girl, Mifuyu.
I, too, believe it would be appropriate to relegate@the task to San Kagura.

group_1.textLeft: …Very well. I apologize in advance, Miyuri…

group_1.textRight: You mean I’m seriously gonna get to be trained@by Lady San?!

group_1.textLeft: I’m truly sorry I couldn’t do more to help you…

group_1.textRight: No, no, I’m really, really, REALLY happy that I’m@gonna be with her!
Pfft!
Do you seriously prefer San Kagura over Mifuyu,@Miyuri Yukari?

group_1.textLeft: Th-that’s not what I meant…!
Nobody else could even come close to matching@Lady San’s legs, though…

group_1.textCenter: Mifuyuuu, I’d like you to come model for me.

group_1.textLeft: Alina…?!

group_1.textRight: I am in the mood to draw your perfect body@today.

group_1.textLeft: …Can it wait? I’m in the middle of something@right now…
If you’re going to draw her, does that mean she’s@gonna show off her legs…?!
Um, um! Can I join you?!

group_1.textRight: I have no idea who you are, but as long as you@don’t interrupt me, sure.

group_1.textLeft: …*sigh*
…That said, I’m afraid I won’t be able to assist anymore…
Would it be okay if I asked you to take it from@here…?

group_1.textRight: No, I should be the one apologizing for the@difficulty Miyu caused you…
(If Mifuyu is set on this, then I have no choice@but to teach her…)
(But what should I do…?)

group_1.narration: Come to think of it, Miyu told me that she can@still hear my voice when she’s unconscious…
If that’s true, then perhaps I would be able to@control her while she’s blacked out…

group_1.textRight: (Back on that day… I knew I wanted to train her. @I should trust my instincts…)
Very well. Leave it to me.
COME ON, MIYU! On your feet at once!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes ma’aaam…! Aah, please do it even harder!

group_1.textRight: [surround:1031A01][chara:103200:effect_7001_attack02]You HAVE to fight back! If you were up against a@Witch, you’d be DEAD MEAT!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103200:effect_7003_damage02][surround:1031A02][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Aaah! Step on me more, pleaaase!
Sounds like they’re getting on well, doesn’t it?@[chara:100700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100700:cheek_0][chara:100700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:100700:lipSynch_1]Heheh.

group_1.textRight: …When fighting against Witches, the Instructor@controls Miyuri.
She seems to fight better that way, so it works@out…I think?
You CANNOT faint this easily or you won’t even@be able to THINK about having a future!

group_1.textLeft: O-okhaaay!
